data.actual_result: It keeps the results from the other tab and might flicker sometimes when one tab has no results
data.expected_result: It changes to the correct results
data.short_description: The recent mentions tab can load/flick different results when switching between them while loading
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the Recent Mentions - Quickly switch to All servers and then back - Repeat many times until you get flickers/results in the wrong tab
